text: With the first lamb offer a tenth of an ephah of fine flour,29:40 A tenth of an ephah is approximately 2 dry quarts or 2.2 liters (probably about 2.6 pounds or 1.2 kilograms of flour). mixed with a quarter hin of oil from pressed olives,29:40 Hebrew a quarter hin of pressed oil; that is, approximately 0.97 quarts or 0.92 liters and a drink offering of a quarter hin of wine.
